thread.title: Stephen Curry’s Under Armour Curry 3 “Chinese New Year” Is Dropping This Weekend
thread.title_full: Stephen Curry’s Under Armour Curry 3 “Chinese New Year” Is Dropping This Weekend

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Stephen Curry’s Under Armour Curry 3 “Chinese New Year” Is Dropping This Weekend
text:
Yesterday Stephen Curry was announced as a Western Conference starter for this year’s NBA All-Star Game, as now we get a look at the latest colorway of his Curry 3 signature that is arriving this weekend.
In paying homage to the Chinese New Year, the coinciding theme for the release is “Happiness, longevity and good fortune. Sweep away the bad to make room for the good.” We in turn see the hoops shoe boasting a bright red upper, with multicolored detailing positioned along the midsole and heel trim. Tonal red SC branding is then featured towards the toe, while Under Amour tagging is done up in gold atop the tongue.
You’ll be able to cop the Under Armour Curry 3 “Chinese New Year” beginning January 21 at select UA providers nationwide.
